subject: order
description_text:
Dear Sir/Madam,

 I wanted to ask if the baseplate and carbon fiber heel plate are included
in the other package (SF6047091733084) or if they are missing? I only
received the two pedals without the carbon baseplate.

order #SSN3903

Sincerely,
Philipp Bachmann

conversations.body_text: Hi Philipp Bachmann,    We apologize, but the Pro X Ultra baseplate is currently out of stock at our German warehouse. We have shipped it to you separately. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELE0270946841YQ
